website_summaries.verdict: Beautifully handcrafted cards that are highly detailed and make an excellent addition to your holiday decor.
pros: Pop-up designs are detailed and unique
Makes an excellent addition to your holiday decor
Ample blank space to include your own holiday message
Set of 7 cards sit at a lower price point than similar pop-up cards
cons: Cards are quite heavy and may require extra postage if anything is added to the envelope

customer_reviews.title: Love these! 5 of the 7 take more than one stamp to send
customer_reviews.text: These turned out awesome! Unfortunately I didn’t take pictures of the cars until after I wrote in them. Two of these cards took normal 49 cent postage/ forever stamps, the ones with the deer in the trees. The other five all cost 70 cents to post. So for the snowman, Christmas tree, Santa skating, Santa on motorcycle, and the house, make sure you either use 2 forever stamps or go to the post office and pay for stamps which make denominations of 70 cents for each.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: You Will Not Regret Buying These Cards
customer_reviews.text: At least, I definitely do not regret buying these cards! These are seven very, very cool 3-D cards, and all arrived in great shape. I know that the people I sent these to yesterday will be 100% blown away. A few things to know: 1) I received very well-designed and constructed cards--no flaws in the ones I received. 2) You need to seal the envelopes with tape--not a problem for me. 3) They will cost more to send (.70 to .90 each for me) because they are a non-standard size. Again, these are special cards so it does not phase me...Great product.
customer_reviews.author: KAE

customer_reviews.title: Can't seal the envelopes! No glue!
customer_reviews.text: Although these are well done and cute (and priced less than some others) they have NO GLUE TO SEAL THE ENVELOPE for mailing!! I had to buy some Elmer's glue to seal them and hope it wouldn't leach onto the card itself. I wouldn't buy these again because of this. Also, all the cards are red outside, not sure if that is shown, although that's not a big deal. Finally, the envelopes should advise that extra postage will be needed since the cards are heavier than normal (one was 1.3 ounces).
customer_reviews.author: Fleaker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and clever pop-ups
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and clever pop-ups. Great alternative to conventional holiday cards. Recipients loved getting them. Especially when family start talking and instead of everyone getting the same card; the uncle who hunts gets the deer card, the cousin who rides a motorcycle gets Santa on a motorcycle, the sister in Florida who never sees snow gets the snowman. I would definitely send pop-ups again.
customer_reviews.author: Carroll J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: the cards are lovely and unique, and the price is much better than for other pop up cards...a winner. UNTIL you want to mail it; the glue on the envelopes is useless, if there is any at all-I don't like putting tape on such nice envelopes, but I didn't have a choice. Still, they're really pretty; guess the reason the price is low is they didn't want to spring for decent glue to seal the envelopes; few things are perfect, as I am reminded yet again.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: The Family Loved Them!
customer_reviews.text: These cards are very cute & well made. I like that each card was different & family members enjoyed looking to see what the others got. All in all, the family was pretty impressed by the cards & liked them a lot. The envelopes fit each card fine. The only reason why I didn't give it five stars is because one of the cards was bent a little when I received it in the mail. Otherwise, they were great!
customer_reviews.author: Gena Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality cards
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, high quality cards! Really intricate and well designed. I purchased them to use with gift cards. Although there isn't an actual slot for a gift card, there is space on each to attach the gift card without covering up any of the design. One of the cards was damaged, but for the price, I didn't care and I didn't need it. I would highly recommend these to anyone looking to make a gift card or cash a more festive gift.
customer_reviews.author: NCAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Western origami come hither this holiday
customer_reviews.text: So so magical and well-made. Can't wait to send them out. Love pop-up anything, and these are worth the $2.85/card price forsho :D really good quality, and all 7 are different. love the snowman! #westernorigami
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiny A Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Glueless envelope flaps
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the Xmas cards but 1 star for the envelopes. No glue on the flaps. Had to use a glue pen and hope that the glue on the envelope flap did not get on the card as it sealed. I also tried using stickers to close the flap and some of them came off. Even the return address labels. Whatever coating was used for the envls made them slippery. This looks like a manufacturer slip-up.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased as Punch

customer_reviews.title: Tasteful and cute
customer_reviews.text: These cards are better quality than I expected from "made in China" cards. That being said, one of them is unusable because the letters spelling Merry Christmas are outlined but not painted correctly. They have non-standard size envelopes which have no adhesive on them, but I knew that ahead of time and used tape and stickers. Would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: W.D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: These are exactly as pictured - good quality cards at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as pictured - good quality cards at a great price. The other reviewer is correct - the envelopes don't have glue on them - need to use tape. Also the envelopes have a bit of a gloss to them, so if you're using a rubber return address stamp, make sure you keep them separate for drying time or they will smudge. Beware the cards are square, so they require extra postage.
customer_reviews.author: NJA_NYC

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: A bit delicate, but most of these types of cards are. A nice alternative to standard christmas cards. Less expensive than the more pricey options, but not quite as precise or well-made. Still, these are my go-to type of cards for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Clever Designs
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised! These are very good quality with unique designs/composition. As noted in other reviews, envelopes are not standard, but have a nice satin finish and came with clear round sealing stickers. They will require extra postage, but I definitely would recommend if you want to step away from the run-of-the-mill Christmas card!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cards, but Seven Distinct Envelopes
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous Assortment - Perfect for all kinds of friends and family. The 3D effect is definitely a wow factor and these are nicely made. Only caveat - I took them all out of the envelopes, reviewed them, signed them... when I went to put them back in the envelopes - turns out the different cards are slightly different sizes and my last card didn't fit the last envelope, I had to improvise - but great surprise holiday cards overall!
customer_reviews.author: C. whittlinger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, intricate designs! My family loved receiving these Christmas cards
customer_reviews.text: These are so intricate, and lovely! Sent them out for cards this year and everyone commented on how much they loved receiving them! Some of the cards didn't fit the envelopes all the way, and they don't have adhesive. Other than that, a perfect extra special touch to send to your loved ones.
customer_reviews.author: The Dawg Lady

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pop up Christmas card
customer_reviews.text: I love pop up cards so much nicer then th traditional cards we often receive. These do not have any writings therefore you can write your own message and personalize them. The only reason I'm giving it a 4 star is because I have seen much nicer ones at 20$ each but for this price they really are wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Gorilla Glue?
customer_reviews.text: What no glue on the envelopes*&^%%$#@! Had I known I would have never bought several packets of these. Tape it and make it look like a kids craft project...sheeesh. The tacky should have been on the envelop instead of making it into a tacky card.
customer_reviews.author: Review Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift just by sending one of these cards.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone I sent these to have comments on how lovely they are. They are simply so special and lovely. It is a gift to everyone you send them to. I especially love Santa on a motorcycle that stands up in the middle of the card.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S

customer_reviews.title: I love the designs
customer_reviews.text: I've given most of my 3D Christmas cards away. I love the designs, but I had to air them out for a couple of days because they had a strong plastic odor.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan C

customer_reviews.title: Very special.
customer_reviews.text: I love 3D cards. They are so special. I am hooked on giving these cards to all the nice people in my life. It makes everybody happy!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Twiss

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but lacking in quality
customer_reviews.text: There was no adhesive on the envelopes. Seals were provided, but were difficult to get off the seal holder. I ended up having to use scotch tape. Also, some of the scenes are upside down in the card.
customer_reviews.author: B Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Cards!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cards. Intricate designs. Be aware that the cards are envelope specific. Some cards are larger than the others, so you need to keep the envelope and card together as a set when addressing them. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Texas MiMi

customer_reviews.title: Pop-up your Christmas maiilings!!
customer_reviews.text: Pop-up cards are usually more than I care to spend when I need to send a number of them, These are quite nice,and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cards
customer_reviews.text: I like these cards. The only reason I did not give a 5 was because one arrived damaged and can’t be fixed. As mentioned in other reviews glue on envelope is useless. I didn’t mind because I always tape envelopes closed anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Gardner

customer_reviews.title: MAGICAL
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, fantastic ,wonderful cards! Everyone will be thrilled to get one. MAGICAL
customer_reviews.author: MAH

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: The cards I received had very nice laser cuts, but the thin pieces were either bent or torn, very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for 6 of the 7 cards
customer_reviews.text: These cards got a lot of compliments. There are a couple distinct styles - Santa on a motorcycle is a different look than the intricate snowy cabin scene! I ended up appreciating that because I was able to match cards to recipients better than I expected. The only one I thought was lower quality was the ice skating Santa, but this was still a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Christmas Cards
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made and colorful. These cards are not inexpensive, but are worth the cost for the joy of the popup! Well worth the $2.70 or so per card.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann E.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: These are some truely amazing cards. I used these cards this year for Christmas and everyone loves them!! Reminds me of being back in Germany
customer_reviews.author: Hunting chick

customer_reviews.title: I was not pleased with the packaging
customer_reviews.text: I don't know where these came from but one of the cards was put together upside down. I suspect they were formatted in China where most popups are made, however these were a different breed which is revealed in their construction. I was not pleased with the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Pammer

customer_reviews.title: Order now you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: A tasteful selection of amazing Christmas cards! At less than $3.00 each, you get a lot of “Wow” for the same or less than you spend at a gift shop for a regular card. These are like a mini gift for the recipient. Card stock is heavy and slightly glittered. Now we must figure out who gets each one.
customer_reviews.author: SutoJL

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: All the cards arrived intact and functional, with well crafted popup figures that folded and unfolded with ease. The cards will have to be weighted down in order to stay open flat, but that is to be expected. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Britt

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these cards. So cute. Even my husband likes them! Good quality, also.
customer_reviews.author: C. skinner

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: These are quality cards. Perfect for children with money in them at Christmas. My big family look forward to these special cards every year!
customer_reviews.author: reader all night

customer_reviews.title: Well made with excellent detail.
customer_reviews.text: It's got to be pretty good if the card was a bigger hit than the present for a 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Great cards. Just as wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great cards. Just as wonderful, but at a much lower price, than the cards made popular by a tv reality show.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ison

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to get these cards until I just sat down to get them ready for mailing out. They have no adhesive on the envelopes and the stickers that were provided to seal the envelopes peel off paper and all so they aren’t usable!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Swenson

customer_reviews.title: No adhesive on envelopes......
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these cards are OK. I purchased them to mail to friends and relatives, and the non-adhesive envelopes really are a poor choice by the manufacturer. Personally, I wouldn’t purchase these again for this fact alone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved them. Worjedd every time. Not like cheapie ones that don't work. Will buy next year.
customer_reviews.author: SJB POWERS

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved theirs!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cards that are unique and loved by the recipients.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE SIMMONS

customer_reviews.title: They are very nice but all of them of the same !
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t dislike them but I thought that in the package of 5 they would be all different but it isn’t ! I’ll keep them anyway since they are nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: Grace M

customer_reviews.title: I love pop-ups and these are going to make wonderful Xmas ...
customer_reviews.text: I just flipped when I opened these cards to look at them! I love pop-ups and these are going to make wonderful Xmas greetings next year! Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!!
customer_reviews.text: They’re just ok. The colors aren’t bright and vivid and they’re not as intricate as pictured. Wouldn’t buy again. I guess you get what you pay for, lol.
customer_reviews.author: susan stawarski

customer_reviews.title: pop up cards
customer_reviews.text: Pop ups were cute and well done. Wish they were a bit bigger but I did really like them
customer_reviews.author: mary jo Butler

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. These popup cards seem like a greater idea than they turn out to be. But they are okay.
customer_reviews.author: IW - female - 61

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really cool and will surprise everyone when I send them at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great but there’s always one card that is “eh” compared ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great but there’s always one card that is “eh” compared to how great the other cards are made.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Exciting to give
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time to order & still love thesew
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: ... one of these was so thrilled thought they were beautiful and unique
customer_reviews.text: Everyone that received one of these was so thrilled thought they were beautiful and unique
customer_reviews.author: Barbara  with a B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfull !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love sending the cards and my friends love receiving them.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Better than some, still second class paperwork. Disappointing. I'll deal only with,museums from now on. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight Paper and Skill
customer_reviews.text: These are a wonderful gift contained in just a card.
customer_reviews.author: ALICE WIKEL

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and designed cards. They were a hit with everyone.
customer_reviews.text: Very well crafted. Artistic messaging is fun and everyone enjoys pop-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: The cards are great. Nice detail and very elegant
customer_reviews.text: The cards are great. Nice detail and very elegant. The pkg only had 4 cards, not the 7 as the description states.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M

customer_reviews.title: These cards are wonderful and detailed in the construction
customer_reviews.text: These cards are wonderful and detailed in the construction. They popup easily and fold back down easily. very well made!
customer_reviews.author: april ellis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Detail!
customer_reviews.text: I just loved these Christmas cards! The detail was amazing! Write your own message. I will buy again for next year!
customer_reviews.author: puffruger

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: These cards are ok stock but they are not as pictured they are not as expected..thanks..no I wouldnt order again
customer_reviews.author: Kulena

customer_reviews.title: These pop up cards are more impressive than I imagined ...
customer_reviews.text: These pop up cards are more impressive than I imagined. Unfortunately, after a few weeks, the bottom base starts to warp and the edges curl.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mannheimer

customer_reviews.title: It is fun to open these cards and see 3D image unfolding
customer_reviews.text: Very creative. It is fun to open these cards and see 3D image unfolding. Great idea!
customer_reviews.author: G.S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good detail.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of cards. All were good except for the Santa on the bike. Did not have anyone to send him to.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Christmad cards!
customer_reviews.text: These darling cards were a huge hit with family and friends! Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Cards were a lot of fun, very pretty and arrived in excellent condition. For your information they do require extra postage.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Oke

customer_reviews.title: Nice cards
customer_reviews.text: These are cute. With the pop up inside. Note they are square so they may take more US postage. Also, no adhesive on the flap so stickers might be a good idea!
customer_reviews.author: MandC

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but
customer_reviews.text: Like the other pop up cards I bought, I love these cards but they don't stay open. Difficult to write a note inside the cards.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Just something different. I still like sending christmas cards and nice to do something a little different.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Ramsdell

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cute designs but quality not as good as other card companies who make the 3-D cards.
customer_reviews.author: Sean H.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the cards! They look very elegant and high quality. Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: VAN_ster28

customer_reviews.title: Way better than normal Christmas cards
customer_reviews.text: These are super creative Christmas cards. They can sit out like decorations and almost better than seeing Santa come down the chimney.
customer_reviews.author: ch-home

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. I love to send cards, so will use again.
customer_reviews.author: O. Hasemann

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cards!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cards. Excellent workmanship. I love them and will order more!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. DePasquale

customer_reviews.title: Missed the mark
customer_reviews.text: Awkward design, something was "off"about the placement of the pop up.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: People I haven't talked to in years, called when they opened their card.
customer_reviews.author: LadyUtah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were a big hit with everyone I sent them to.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: People LOVE these and most save them after using them as extra decorations. And they're affordable !!!
customer_reviews.author: scorpio46

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cards
customer_reviews.text: Cards were very good quality and were well received by my kids and family at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Schierer

customer_reviews.title: Great unusual Christmas cards
customer_reviews.text: There was no glue - not a real problem since I just used tape to seal it. Very good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ng

customer_reviews.title: These cards are absolutely beautiful. The papercuts are very intricate and pop up ...
customer_reviews.text: These cards are absolutely beautiful. The papercuts are very intricate and pop up easily. I will definitely order more from this company
customer_reviews.author: bookperson

customer_reviews.title: Cards are cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cards are cheap looking and no glue to seal the envelope. Will buy the more expensive and better quality card from the original popup company next year!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who received one was delighted. Would like to handpick them next time.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet K Cullinan

customer_reviews.title: 😠
customer_reviews.text: The cards were falling apart! The pop-up inserts fell out the cards. What did I use them for? To line my trash can! 😠
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: family loved these cards
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my.family loved these cards. All but one were perfec, the Santa on a motorcycle was a little messed up his face had detached, easily fixable with super glue though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked the cards
customer_reviews.text: Liked the cards. The envelopes were ridiculous. no glue on the flaps, odd sizes, could barely get the cards in to them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these detailed and beautiful pop-up cards and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette O.Top Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and described. Beautiful set of cards. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: 3D Greeting Christmas Cards Papercraft 7 Pack Holiday Birthday Pop Up Cards Gift
product_meta.description:
Color:RedIntricate laser cut pop-up 3D decoration on the inside
There is no greeting so you are free to write your own message.

Including 7 popup card, 7 envelope
1*Christmas tree size:5.9*5.9" 
1*reindeer with frost trees size:6.2*5.1"
1*reindeer on the bridge size:6.2*5.1"
1*snowman with tree size:5.9*5.9"
1*dancing Santa's size:5.9*5.9"
1*house with trees size:5.9*5.9"
1*Christmas night size:5.9*5.9"


Tips:
Please open this 3D cards lightly and not expand it more than 180°.
The color maybe a little different since with different production batch.
The product maybe a little different with the picture since all of these 3D cards are made by hand.
feature_bullets: Christmas Cards are hand made very beautiful and amazing with nice size about 5.9"*5.9"
3D Pop Up Cards with laser cut designs: with the creative papercraft you can imagine a person would be completely surprised to open the card and see everything pop-up

Free to add your Christmas and new year greeting words or any own message since there is no greeting printed. Perfect as a new year card, gift card, happy holiday card, greeting festival card, anniversary card, birthday card, thanksgiving card, wedding invitations, valentines day card and so on
Solid card stock and the elegant pearlized envelopes give these gift cards a very high quality look and stay clean

7 Pop Up Cards set for Christmas included: Christmas tree, reindeer with frost trees, reindeer on the bridge, snowman with tree, dancing Santa's, house with trees, Christmas night, best gift cards for kids, parent, friends, neighbors, families, relatives, colleague, girlfriend, lover

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars225 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
